executable.title: Fit an ellipse to the skull in US image. The skull must be in hight intensity
executable.description: Using two points given by the calipers, fits an skull to the US image

image.name: inputLabelFilename
image.label: Input label image
image.description: Input labeled image with 0 for background and objects with 1. There must be only two labeled regions corresponding to two calipers in the skull

image.name: inputFilename
image.label: Input US image
image.description: Input US image like biparietal diameter or head circumference
